result.summary_1_page: The Apple iPhone 15 Pro combines premium design with cutting-edge performance. Its titanium frame reduces weight to 187g while maintaining durability (GSMArena, TechRadar). The 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display offers 120Hz ProMotion, 2000 nits HBM brightness, and thinner bezels (PhoneArena, NotebookCheck). Powered by the 3nm A17 Pro chip, it delivers class-leading CPU/GPU performance but faces thermal throttling under sustained loads (NotebookCheck, Android Authority). The triple-camera system features a 48MP main sensor with 24MP default output, improved stabilization, and ProRes video recording, though it lacks the Pro Max's 5x telephoto (DxOMark, TomsGuide). Battery life averages 12-13 hours of active use with slow 20W charging criticized by multiple sources (GSMArena, PhoneArena). Key upgrades include USB-C with 10Gbps data transfer, customizable Action Button replacing the mute switch, and iOS 17 with features like StandBy mode. While software support isn't formally guaranteed for 7 years, Apple's update history suggests 5-6 years of updates (Android Authority, TechRadar).
pros: Titanium frame reduces weight (19g lighter) while maintaining premium build quality (GSMArena, TechRadar, NotebookCheck)
USB-C port enables faster 10Gbps data transfer and universal charging (Android Authority, PhoneArena, TechRadar)
A17 Pro chip delivers best-in-class performance for gaming and multitasking (NotebookCheck, TomsGuide, TechRadar)
Excellent camera system with 48MP main sensor, improved video stabilization, and ProRes LOG support (DxOMark 154, PhoneArena, Android Central)
Vibrant 6.1" OLED display with 2000 nits peak brightness and Always-On functionality (GSMArena, DxOMark 151, TomsGuide)
cons: Limited 3x optical zoom vs. 5x on Pro Max model (PhoneArena, TomsGuide, GSMArena)
Slow 20W wired charging takes 90+ minutes for full charge (Android Authority, GSMArena, PhoneArena)
Thermal throttling observed during extended gaming/video sessions (NotebookCheck, Android Authority)
High starting price ($999) for 128GB base storage (TomsGuide, Android Central)
PWM flickering at low brightness may cause eye strain (NotebookCheck, GSMArena)

attributes.name: Camera
attributes.explanation: DXOMark 154. 48MP main praised for daylight/portraits. Video stabilization and ProRes LOG excellent. Low-light and ultrawide performance criticized by 3 sources.

attributes.name: Battery Endurance
attributes.explanation: GSMArena Active Use 12:58h. 20W charging takes 90+ minutes. Good efficiency but slow charging criticized by 4 sources.

attributes.name: Performance
attributes.explanation: Geekbench 7172 multi-core. Minor throttling to 85% noted by NotebookCheck. A17 Pro leads in CPU tests.

attributes.name: Display
attributes.explanation: DXOMark Display 151. 2000 nits peak, excellent color accuracy. PWM flickering at low brightness noted.

attributes.name: Software Experience
attributes.explanation: iOS 17 clean with StandBy mode. 5-6 years updates expected. Some bugs reported at launch.

attributes.name: Design & Build
attributes.explanation: Titanium frame premium at 187g. IP68 rating. Improved grip over predecessors.

attributes.name: Longevity Value
attributes.explanation: 5-6 years support expected. $999 base price criticized by 3+ sources. Strong resale value.
